Core Features

  • STORE

    Store your desired candidates in one location and reuse when required

  • SUBMIT

    Submit the most appropriate candidate against a particular job

  • ORGANIZE

    Organize the CV in your desired order which makes finding the CV much simpler

  • TRACK

    Get notified about the status of the candidate applied against a job

  • SEARCH

    Searching a single CV from thousands is so simple by using our custom built filters

  • EMPOWER

    Empower to work faster than your competition

Antlegs was designed for independent recruiters and comes in a rewarding system on each hirings

Antlegs was built from the ground-up and was designed to cater to the unique requirements of our region. It gives you the tools you need to save time, close jobs efficiently, and to make your interactions with your clients a world-class experience.

Find CVs instantly

Finding a matching CV for a client is challenging enough. Searching for that CV across multiple locations like your Inbox, your laptop and your shared folders is far more challenging. Antlegs puts everything in a single searchable database - using a powerful search engine, it makes it a breeze to find a CV in your database.

Send Stunning CVs to Clients

Beautifully formatted professional looking CVs that will impress your clients. And whatâ€™s more? They can accept or reject the CV at the click of a button within the same screen - and you will be alerted immediately.
